title: Lincoln's WARNING #100041: Climate Policy Controversy
script: Climate Policy Controversy?! Man, fuck all that! They lying to your FACE and you just accepting it! These old ass politicians ain't NEVER struggled a day! Never missed a meal! Never chose between rent and food! But THEY know what's best for YOU?! Bullshit! Bitcoin QR! Climate Policy Controversy? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
